how long will my accout be under review

Hi Colin, the ad approval process usually takes between 1-2 business days. If your account is new and not verified, it might take longer. Please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –
Company's full address
Company's legal entity name
Company's EHID or DUNS number
Primary contact person's name
Company's phone number
Once we receive this information, we will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status.
